title: Historic Old Town Apartment with Modern Comforts—Ideal for Students!
description: Step into this beautifully renovated 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in Krosno’s storied Old Town. With 64 sqm of spacious, practical layouts, this sun-soaked home features soundproof walls and energy-efficient windows, ensuring both peace and savings. A private balcony creates a perfect spot for your morning coffee, while a shared courtyard and outdoor dining area bring neighborhood vibes alive. Join the blend of history and comfort in a residence that feels uniquely yours, with an advanced security system providing added peace of mind.
neighborhood_description: Located in Krosno’s scenic Old Town, the area is steeped in the city’s signature historic charm and brims with a quaint, pet-friendly ambiance perfect for four-legged companions. Residents enjoy direct access to the highway for easy getaways, as well as cozy cafes, local shops, and cultural sites all within a short stroll. The district's laid-back pace combines student-friendly atmosphere with sunny green spaces and cobblestone streets.
lifestyle_benefits: surrounded by cultural venues and cafés
target_buyer: Best suited for students and young professionals seeking stylish, low-maintenance living in a historic setting, with space for roommates or guests.
market_positioning: A rare mid-size apartment in a picturesque, quiet quarter—offering comfort, security, and affordability just outside of bustling city life. Stand out from standard student rentals or single-room houses with genuine style, utility, and Old Town character.
